bug.author: biellls
bug.summary: Can't install in OS X Mojave
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1 when installing streamlit for python 3 on OS X Mojave with the latest version of XCode (11.1). <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
pip3 install streamlit

https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/d0/99/f8166f0baac96f2ea4d634749331bf78d8830db9991fc8086e828dca8959/streamlit-0.47.4-py2.py3-none-any.whl Requirement already satisfied: altair>=3.2.0 in comments.comment: Thanks that fixed it. Love the product, keep up the great work!
